---
title: "Nursing Student Performance"
description: "A Time Series Approach."
author:
  - name: Sa√Ød Maanan
date: 24-12-2023
categories: [R] 
image: bird.jpg
draft: false 
---


::: column-body
In this blog we will check the performance of students in one of Morocco's nursing institutes to see if a pattern exists.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
data.Ex10.1 <- read.table("http://waveland.com/Glover-Mitchell/Example10-1.txt", header = TRUE)
tail(data.Ex10.1, n=3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
  Temperature HrtRt
7          14    32
8          16    29
9          18    32
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(data.Ex10.1$Temperature, data.Ex10.1$HrtRt,
     main = "Heart Rate vs Temperature",
     xlab = "Temperature (C)",
     ylab = "BPM")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](student_performance_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
lm.Ex10.1 <- lm(HrtRt ~ Temperature, data = data.Ex10.1)
lm.Ex10.1
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```

Call:
lm(formula = HrtRt ~ Temperature, data = data.Ex10.1)

Coefficients:
(Intercept)  Temperature  
      2.139        1.775  
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(data.Ex10.1, main="Heart Rate vs Temperature",
     xlab="Temperature (C)", ylab="BPM")
abline(lm.Ex10.1, col = "red")
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](student_performance_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
aov.Ex10.1 <- aov(HrtRt ~ Temperature, data = data.Ex10.1)
summary(aov.Ex10.1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
            Df Sum Sq Mean Sq F value   Pr(>F)    
Temperature  1  756.2   756.2   108.6 1.63e-05 ***
Residuals    7   48.7     7.0                     
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
confint(lm.Ex10.1)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
                2.5 %   97.5 %
(Intercept) -2.394015 6.671792
Temperature  1.372241 2.177759
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
confint(lm.Ex10.1, level = 0.99)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
                0.5 %   99.5 %
(Intercept) -4.569501 8.847278
Temperature  1.178944 2.371056
```
:::
:::


:::
